title: Does Nicki Minaj deserve the title 'Queen of Rap'? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t love her for personally opinion but yes she is the queen of RAP that because no one in the game can defeat her Iggy she did in 2014 and almost she was better than her with her legendary album new classic and that albums have achievements really Nicki never get them but that is just for year and one album after that Iggy hasn’t released something wow and no one does compering to Nicki level now Cardi B with one MV and one album she run over Nicki and we got to call her Queen of Rap so far cause her album was masterful at least we have to wait Nicki coming up and i am sure she is going to amaze us

Yes, Nicki Minaj deserves that! Her lyrics, beats, quality, and personality is on fleek. Unlike Iggy her lyrics aren't always very understandable when she is on live and Nicki Minaj's always are. Lil Kim shouldn't get this because her beats and lyrics and not on flow. Other female rapper are cool, but they can't be compared to Nicki Minaj!!    Love You Nicki Minaj!
